testimonials.customerTitle: 【中文翻译: What Our Users Say】
testimonials.businessTitle: 【中文翻译: What Business Owners Say】

items.quote: 【中文翻译: Okay so I had like 6 different punch cards in my wallet and could never find the right one. This app is honestly just way easier.】
items.author: 【中文翻译: Sarah M.】

items.quote: 【中文翻译: Pretty solid app. I've saved maybe $30-40 this month just from actually remembering to use my rewards. The barcode scanner is a bit slow sometimes but whatever, it works.】
items.author: 【中文翻译: Mike R.】

items.quote: 【中文翻译: I'm one stamp away from a free burrito at my local spot and the app sent me a notification. Small thing but it made my day lol】
items.author: 【中文翻译: Emma L.】

items.quote: 【中文翻译: We saw a 35% increase in repeat customers within the first month. The setup was incredibly easy.】
items.author: 【中文翻译: David Chen】
items.role: 【中文翻译: Cafe Owner, Brew & Bean】

items.quote: 【中文翻译: The analytics help us understand our customers better. We've optimized our rewards and increased sales.】
items.author: 【中文翻译: Maria Rodriguez】
items.role: 【中文翻译: Restaurant Manager, Taco Corner】

items.quote: 【中文翻译: Our customers love the convenience. No more paper cards cluttering their wallets!】
items.author: 【中文翻译: James Wilson】

business.title: 【中文翻译: Ready to Boost Customer Loyalty?】
business.subtitle: 【中文翻译: Join hundreds of businesses using gobonki to increase repeat customers and drive revenue. Set up your loyalty program in minutes.】

cta.title: 【中文翻译: Ready to boost customer loyalty?】
cta.subtitle: 【中文翻译: Join thousands of businesses using gobonki to create lasting customer relationships】

customers.q: 【中文翻译: Do I need to install an app?】
customers.a: 【中文翻译: No app required. You scan a QR code at the counter and your stamps are saved to your phone's browser wallet.】

customers.q: 【中文翻译: How do I redeem a reward?】
customers.a: 【中文翻译: Once you collect enough stamps, show your phone to the cashier. They tap 'Redeem' and your reward is applied instantly.】

customers.q: 【中文翻译: What if I switch or lose my phone?】
customers.a: 【中文翻译: Use the same email or phone number and your stamps sync back. No account passwords needed.】

customers.q: 【中文翻译: Is my data private?】
customers.a: 【中文翻译: Yes. We only store what's needed to track your stamps. No location tracking, no resale of personal data.】

customers.q: 【中文翻译: Does it work at different stores?】
customers.a: 【中文翻译: Yes. gobonki works at cafés, barbers, restaurants—each business can have its own card and rewards.】

customers.q: 【中文翻译: Does it work offline?】
customers.a: 【中文翻译: You can open your card offline, but stamping/redeeming requires a quick online check to prevent fraud.】

businesses.q: 【中文翻译: How long does setup take?】
businesses.a: 【中文翻译: About 2 minutes. Create a card, set your reward, print your QR. That's it—no POS integration required.】

businesses.q: 【中文翻译: Do I need new hardware?】
businesses.a: 【中文翻译: No. Any phone or tablet that can open a browser works. Staff just scans or taps the customer's QR.】

businesses.q: 【中文翻译: How are stamps validated?】
businesses.a: 【中文翻译: QR + server checks prevent duplicates. Optionally require staff PIN or device approval for extra control.】

businesses.q: 【中文翻译: Can I customize rewards and branding?】
businesses.a: 【中文翻译: Yes. Set stamp count, reward text, brand colors and even whitelabel on paid tiers.】
【中文翻译: Start free. Paid features like whitelabel and analytics are optional and transparent—no transaction fees.】

businesses.q: 【中文翻译: Does it integrate with my POS?】
businesses.a: 【中文翻译: Not required. If you want POS sync, we offer a simple export and REST API on higher tiers.】

brand.tagline: 【中文翻译: Your digital stamp card solution】
